languages.text:
Requires Overseer to have Dogmatic — 5
Servo Skull has +20 Fellowship and Intelligence.
Xenos, Psyker and Demons have no armour, deflection, parry and block agains Overseer, while Under Surveillance.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Overseer to have Dogmatic — 5
Servo Skull has +20 Fellowship and Intelligence.
Xenos, Psyker and Demons have no armour, deflection, parry and block agains Overseer, while Under Surveillance.

languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
The Overseer's attacks against xenos, psykers, and daemons that are {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}under surveillance{/g} ignore {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocked{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — фанатик
Рой сервочерепов получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}.
Атаки надзирателя по ксеносам, псайкерам и демонам {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}под наблюдением{/g} игнорируют {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}, их нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блокировать{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サーヴォスカル・スウォームは+20の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}を得る。
監督官の攻撃は、{g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}監督下{/g}のゼノ、異能者、デーモンに対して、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}回避{/g}を無視し、{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を受けない。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.

監督官の攻撃は、{g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}監督下{/g}のゼノ、異能者、デーモンに対して、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}回避{/g}を無視し、{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を受けない。

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} – Eiferer
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}.
Die Angriffe des Aufsehers gegen Xenos, Psioniker und Dämonen, die {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}unter Beobachtung{/g} stehen, ignorieren {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}. Außerdem können sie nicht {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}geblockt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g} werden.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.

traits.locale_text:

Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}.

Außerdem können sie nicht {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}geblockt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g} werden.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Hizmelet sürüsü, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Gözetmen'in {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}gözetim altındaki{/g} zeno, ruhsezer ve iblislere karşı yaptığı saldırılar; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerlerini yok sayar. Ayrıca bu saldırılara karşı {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapılamaz.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
The Overseer's attacks against xenos, psykers, and daemons that are {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}under surveillance{/g} ignore {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocked{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Hizmelet sürüsü, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Gözetmen'in {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}gözetim altındaki{/g} zeno, ruhsezer ve iblislere karşı yaptığı saldırılar; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerlerini yok sayar. Ayrıca bu saldırılara karşı {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapılamaz.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Zélote.
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +20.
Les attaques du surveillant ciblant des xénos, psykers ou démons placés {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}sous surveillance{/g} ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g}, et ne peuvent pas être {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquées{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parées{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot

The Overseer's attacks against xenos, psykers, and daemons that are {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}under surveillance{/g} ignore {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocked{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}.

Les attaques du surveillant ciblant des xénos, psykers ou démons placés {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}sous surveillance{/g} ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g}, et ne peuvent pas être {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquées{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parées{/g}.

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Fanático
El enjambre de servocráneos gana +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
Los ataques del supervisor contra xenos, psíquicos y daemons que estén {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}bajo vigilancia{/g} ignoran la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}, y no pueden {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquearse{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pararse{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Fanático
El enjambre de servocráneos gana +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
Los ataques del supervisor contra xenos, psíquicos y daemons que estén {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}bajo vigilancia{/g} ignoran la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}, y no pueden {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquearse{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pararse{/g}.

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——狂热者
伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高20点。
监察官攻击处于{g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}一览无余{/g}状态的异形、灵能者、恶魔时，此次攻击无视目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，且无法被{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。
